# AI Hero FAQ Agent

An AI-powered FAQ agent built with **Streamlit**. This project allows users to ask questions and get accurate answers from a dataset, using a simple and interactive web interface.

---

## Overview

This project solves the problem of quickly finding answers from a structured dataset.  
The agent uses AI to process the data and provide answers in real-time.  

Key features:

- AI-powered question answering
- Fast search across dataset
- Interactive web interface with Streamlit
- Evaluation metrics included

Here‚Äôs a screenshot of the app in action:

![Streamlit Demo](demo/faq_app_screenshot.png)
![Streamlit Demo](demo/faq_app_screenshot2.png)

---

## Installation

1. Clone the repository:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/ghada1911/aihero-faq-agent.git
cd aihero-faq-agent
````

2. Install dependencies (Python 3.11+ recommended):

```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

3. Run the Streamlit app:

```bash
streamlit run faq_agent_app.py
```

Open your browser and go to `http://localhost:8501`.

---

## Usage

* Type your question in the search box.
* The AI agent will return the most relevant answers from the dataset.
* Works for FAQs, guides, or any structured data source.

---

## Features

* **AI Question Answering:** Uses AI models to understand and answer queries.
* **Streamlit Interface:** Easy-to-use web interface.
* **Evaluation Metrics:** Includes simple evaluation logic to measure accuracy.

---

## Evaluations

The evaluation module calculates the accuracy of answers compared to the expected responses.
Example:

```
Accuracy: 92%
Total Questions Tested: 50
```

*(You can adjust this with your own evaluation code.)*
